GSP33bbdip12u:1194: liṅgasvarūpasya tasya viṣṇurūpavyaktiviśeṣaniṣṭhatāyāśca śrutāvasphuṭatvāttadarthamatrārthe smṛtiṃ cāha - yaditi // yasya sthānatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1196_0: 'sarvavastubhiḥ'; sarpirādibhiḥ / 'vāmanaḥ'; sundarastrīneteti vāmanākhyo viṣṇureva 'asmākaṃ'; bhaktānāṃ 'paraḥ'; parā 'gatiḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1196_1: prāpya iti cintayedityarthaḥ / yadvā - vāmana ityanena prāptālpatvaśaṅkāvāraṇāya
GSP33bbdip12u:1206_0: prakaraṇabalāccakṣurantaḥsthatvaṃ viṣṇoḥ pratipādayatsūtramupanyasya tadupāttaśrutimevodāharati - sukheti // 'khaṃ brahmeti';
GSP33bbdip12u:1206_1: ityantasya sūtreṇānvayaḥ upakrame prāṇasya śrutatve 'pi naitatprakaraṇasya
GSP33bbdip12u:1207: tatparatvam, pūrvasūtroktaviṣṇuśrutiliṅgādibādhakasadbhāvāditi pratipādayitum uttaratra śrautakarmaśabdena prāṇabrahmaṇostantreṇopādānātsūcanārthaṃ ca 'prāṇo brahma';
GSP33bbdip12u:1213: sukhena viśiṣṭa iti vā, sukheṣu viśiṣṭa iti vā, vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1215: atra prakaraṇe hi mukhyaprāṇobrahmākhilajīvebhyaḥ pūrṇaḥ iti mukhyaprāṇasya pūrṇatvamuktvā 'kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma'; ityanena 'kaṃ'; sukhaṃ 'brahma'; pūrṇaṃ 'khaṃ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1217: tathā ca na kevalamuktahetubalāccakṣurantaḥstho viṣṇuḥ, kintu - prakaraṇabalācca /
GSP33bbdip12u:1221: yadaivamupakrame kaṃ brahma iti pūrṇasukhābhidhānādevāsya prakaraṇasya vaiṣṇavatvaṃ siddhyati kimuta tadā
GSP33bbdip12u:1222: 'khaṃ brahma'; iti pūrṇajñānādapīti kaimutyanyāyasūcanāya sūtre evakāraḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1227: tathāpi tadbrahmaśabdasya parāparayo rūḍhyā vṛttyā vyākhyānāntaramityadoṣaḥ/
GSP33bbdip12u:1230_0: nanu upakrame pūrṇasukhasaṃvidorabhidhāne 'pi kuto 'sya prakaraṇasya vaiṣṇavatvamityāśaṅkya tayosatallakṣaṇatvāt tadrūpatvāt
GSP33bbdip12u:1230_1: upakrame tadabhidhāne brahmaivopakrāntaṃ syāditi bhāvena pūrṇasukhajñānayorbrahmalakṣaṇatvaṃ śrutyā darśayati - vijñānamiti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1238: ādiśabdena 'athaiṣa eva parama ānandaḥ'; 'satyaṃ jñānam'; ityādikaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:1241: tathā ca - śrutyantare brahmalakṣaṇatvenāvagatayoḥ pūrṇajñānasukhayoratra prakaraṇe 'bhidhānāt asya vaiṣṇavatvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1250: anyeṣāṃ tvāpekṣikameva pūrṇaṃ sukhaṃ na viṣṇuvanniravadhikaṃ pūrṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1260: nanvagyādisukhasyāpekṣikatayāpi pūrṇatvasadbhāvātteṣāṃ pūrṇasukhamidaṃ kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1261: tathā teṣāṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1262: tathā teṣāmevedaṃ prakaraṇaṃ kiṃ na syāt ityata āha - na ceti // 'mukhye';
GSP33bbdip12u:1263: niravadhikapūrṇatve 'kaṃ brahma'; iti śrutyarthatayā tallakṣaṇe sambhavati sati 'amukhyam'; āpekṣikamanyādhīnaṃ pūrṇatvaṃ na yujyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1269: chāndogye 'prāṇo brahma kam'; iti vidyāṃ 'ya eṣa āditye puruṣaḥ'; iti vidyāṃ coktvāgnibhirupakosalaṃ prati 'upakosalaiṣā
GSP33bbdip12u:1270: somya te 'smadvidhā cātmavidyā coktā'; ityuktatvena 'kam'; ityādyavidyāyā viṣṇuviṣayatvasya 'ya eṣaḥ'; iti dvitīyāyāścāgniviṣayatvasyaiva yuktatvāt
GSP33bbdip12u:1278: 'savitāramūtaye'; 'hiraṇyayena savitā rathena'; ityādisavitṛśrutiliṅgādinā tatprakaraṇaṃ sāvitramiti prakaraṇavicchedaḥ, tathātrāpi brahmaṇa upakrame
GSP33bbdip12u:1284: tasmādagniviṣayatvameva cakṣurantaḥsthavidyāyā ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā tadupāttaśrutimevodāharati - śruteti // itītasya sūtreṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1291: śrutopaniṣadāṃ śrutamatadhyātaitadvidyānāṃ puṃsāṃ kena vāyunā kagateḥ 'kaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1292: brahma'; iti vākyabodhitabrahmaprāpteḥ 'sa enān brahma gamayati';
GSP33bbdip12u:1296: tattvapradīpe tu - 'sa enān brahma gamayati'; iti śrutopaniṣatkānāṃ śrutopaniṣadgatopāsanānāṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1300: śrutaviṣayiṇī yā upaniṣat matidhyānarūpopāsanā tatkānāṃ tadgataṃ tadviṣayakaṃ dhyānarūpopāsanaṃ tadvatāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1302: brahmetyanena bahuvrīhisamāsāvayavabhūtaḥ kaśabda āvṛtto brahmavācaka ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:1309: yadyapyasya sūtrasya prakaraṇavicchedaśaṅkāparihārāyopasaṃhārasthaliṅgoktiparatvaṃna paramasādhye yuktyantarapratipādakatvābhāvādatra caśabdo na prayojyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1310: tathāpi 'sa enān brahma'; ityupasaṃhārasthasyaitadvidyāvettṛṇāṃ brahmaprāptirūpaliṅgasya cakṣurantaro viṣṇureveti paramasādhye 'pi
GSP33bbdip12u:1315_0: arciṣoharanha āpūryamāṇapakṣaṃ āpūryamāṇapakṣādyān ṣaḍudaṅṅeti māsānstānmāsebhyaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsarādādityamāditiyāccandramasaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1315_1: candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo mānavaḥ sa enān brahma gamayati'; iti chandogaśruterayamarthaḥ -
GSP33bbdip12u:1317: 'atha'; avasitakarmaṇi 'asmin'; jñāniviṣaye putrādayo yadi 'śavyaṃ'; śavayogyaṃ dahanādikarma kurvanti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1318: 'yadi ca na'; yadi vā na kurvanti 'tadārciṣam'; arcirnāmakadevalokaṃ sambhavanti prāpnuvantyeveme jñānina iti vipariṇāmenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1321: 'āpūryamāṇapakṣaṃ'; śuklapakṣalokaṃ, tataḥ sūryo 'yān'; ṣaṇmāsān udaṅṅeti tanmāsadevalokam uttarāyaṇalokaṃ ca, tataḥ saṃvatsarādādityacandravidyudabhimānilokānkrameṇa prāpnuvanti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1323: 'tasyāḥ'; vidyunnāmnyā bhāratyāḥ 'puruṣo'; bhartā 'mānavo'; manusaṃjñasya viṣṇoḥ priyo mukhyavāyustaṃ gacchanti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1324: 'saḥ'; vāyuḥ 'enān'; svamāptān pratīkālambanān caturmukhākhyaṃ kāryaṃ brahmāpratīkālambanāṃstu
GSP33bbdip12u:1327: astvetadvidyāyāḥ phalatvena brahmaprāptyabhidhānaṃ, tathāpi kuto nāgniviṣayatvamasyā ityata āha - na hīti // 'hi';
GSP33bbdip12u:1332: 'devān devayajo yānti madbhaktā yānti māmapi'; iti smṛtivirodhaṃ sūcayati
GSP33bbdip12u:1339: evamupapattyādibhirviṣṇorakṣisthatvaṃ pratipādya vipakṣe bādhakenāpi tatsamarthayatsūtraṃ paṭhati - anavasthiteriti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1342: kutaḥ? yataḥ sa itaro jīva iti hetusādhyayojanāmabhipretya atra vipakṣe
GSP33bbdip12u:1344: 'sāmyāt'; iti sūtre 'dhyāhṛtaṃ padam, idaṃ ca tattvapradīparītyā
GSP33bbdip12u:1348: itara ityasyāgnirityarthe vācye jīva iti sāmānyenoktiḥ sādhyahetvostantreṇābhidhānārtham /
GSP33bbdip12u:1351: kutaḥ? yataḥ sa itaro jīvaḥ jīvatvāditi yāvat /
GSP33bbdip12u:1352_0: na ca vipakṣe bādhakābhāvaḥ, jīvasya jīvāntaraniyāmakatve prerakatve āntarajīvasyāpi jīvatvasāmyatāttasyāpi niyāmakaṃ jīvāntaraṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1355: agnerjīvasya preryajīvāntareṇa saha paratantrarūpajīvatvasāmyāditi sūtravṛttirdarśitā bhavati
GSP33bbdip12u:1360: na caivaṃ jīvāntarasyāpi svātantryaṃ syāt jīvatvasāmyādityuktamiti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1362: āha - niyameti // jīvatvasāmyepyagnereva svātantryaṃ nānyeṣāmiti niyame pramāṇābhāvādityarthaḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:1364: nanvastvagnerasvātantryaṃ, tathāpi tatprerakasyeśvarasya svātantryasambhavānnānavasthetyata āha - anīśvaretir /
GSP33bbdip12u:1365: iśvaraṃ jagatprerakatvena yo 'pekṣate 'bhyupaiti sar iśvarāpekṣaḥ, sa na bhavatītyanīśvarāpekṣaḥ, tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tasmādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1369: jīvānāṃ jīvāntaraniyāmakatvātkathaṃ tadasambhava ityata āha - anīśvareti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1371: tathā ca - yathāsmatpakṣe sati rājñi maṇḍaleśe prajānāṃ rājaśaktyā niyamyaniyāmakabhāvavart iśvaraśaktyā jīvānāṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1372: jīvāntaraniyāmakatvasambhavaḥ, na tathā parapakṣe sambhavati, pareṇar iśvarānabhyupagamāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1380: 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya
GSP33bbdip12u:1381: pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1384: viṣayavākyodāharaṇapūrvakaṃ viṣayaṃ darśayati - ya iti // ityādīti prathamā saptamyarthe /
GSP33bbdip12u:1392: bṛhadāraṇyake uddālakaṃ prati yājñyavalkyenoktaṃ idaṃ vākyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1394: gacchatīti pṛthivī garuḍaḥ tasmin tiṣṭhan 'pṛthivyāḥ'; tadabhimānicetanāt
GSP33bbdip12u:1396: 'yaṃ ca pṛthivī'; tadabhimānī cetano na veda sākalyena /
GSP33bbdip12u:1398: na kevalaṃ tatra sthitimātraṃ, kintu 'yo 'ntaraḥ'; antaḥsthitvā bāhyaviṣayāpekṣāṃ vinā ramamāṇaḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:1405: 'preyaḥ putrāt'; ityādiśrutyā paramapreyorūpatvāt 'antaraḥ'; atipriyaḥ san 'pṛthivīṃ'; garuḍaṃ 'yamayati'; niyamayati /
GSP33bbdip12u:1407: 'te'; tava 'antaryāmyātmā'; niyāmakaḥ puruṣaḥ 'amṛtaḥ'; nitya iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1408: etena antaro vivikta iti ṭīkāyā bṛhadbhāṣyavirodho nirastaḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:1414: sa ca 'yasya pṛthivī śarīram'; ityādinā sarvātmakatvāt prakṛtistattajjīvo
GSP33bbdip12u:1416: pūrvādhikaraṇatadviṣayavākyasaṅgatiṃ darśayati - tatreti // iyamatra tattvapradīpoktā yojanā - 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan';
GSP33bbdip12u:1419: 'etadamṛtametadabhayam'; iti pūrvanayodāhṛtachāndogyavākye 'kṣipuruṣasyoktamamṛtatvaṃ 'eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ'; ityanena ucyate iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1420_0: anena bṛhadāraṇyakoktāntaryāmiṇi viṣṇvanyatvākṣepamukhena taduktāmṛtatvasyāpyanyaniṣṭhatvaṃ sampādya tasya pūrvādhikaraṇoktākṣisthatvasya
GSP33bbdip12u:1421: tataḥ kimityataḥ sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - sa ceti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1426: tathā ca so 'ntaryāmī jaḍacetanobhayarūpā prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyāditattajjīvo vā yuktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1429: citprakṛteśca sarvābhimānitvena sarvātmakatvāt pṛthivyādijīvasya pṛthivyādisarvaśarīratvāditi yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:1431: nanu yathā prakṛtyādiliṅgena teṣāmantaryāmitvaṃ tathā amṛtatvaliṅgena viṣṇostatkiṃ na syādityata āha - na hīti // pṛthivyādi śarīraṃ yasya sa
GSP33bbdip12u:1432: tathoktaḥ, tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tvapratyayāpāṭhe tvanvayaḥ ṛjuḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1437: saiddhāntikaliṅgāpekṣayā pūrvapakṣaliṅgasya niravakāśatayā balavattvādanena tasya bādhānnāntaryāmī viṣṇuriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1442: 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda, yaḥ pṛthivyā antaraḥ'; (bṛ. 5-7-3.) ityādinā adhidaivādiṣu taddharmavyapadeśāt viṣṇurevāntaryāmī /
GSP33bbdip12u:1443: siddhāntayatsūtramavatārya vyācaṣṭe - ata iti // ityādinā vākyena iti
GSP33bbdip12u:1445: tatra yadyapi sautravyapadeśapadena abhipretaṃ 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayati'; iti vākyamevodāhartavyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1460: sūtre bhāṣye cādhidaivetyuktyā pṛthivyādīnāṃ jaḍatvena tadaviditatvaṃ sarvasyāpi sambhavatīti śaṅkā vāritā /
GSP33bbdip12u:1461: atroktānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ adhidaivatvena cetanatvāt 'prāṇe'; iti śrutau prāṇaśabdaḥ prāṇavāyudevatāparaḥ, saiva prameyadīparītyā prāṇendriyadevatā /
GSP33bbdip12u:1468: anena 'eṣa ta ātmā'; (bṛ. 5-7-3.) ityuktāntaryāmī sa viṣṇureva /
GSP33bbdip12u:1471: aviditatvāntaratvādeḥ 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda'; ityādinoktatvāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati
GSP33bbdip12u:1472: sa hi 'na te viṣṇo jāyamāno na jātaḥ'; (ṛ. 7-99-2.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1475: aviditatvādeḥ kuto viṣṇudharmatvamityata āha - sa hīti // 'saḥ'; viṣṇuḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1478_0: (subāla. 7.) ityupakramya 'yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaraḥ sañcaran yaṃ pṛthivī na veda eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmā
GSP33bbdip12u:1478_1: apahatapāpmā divyo deva eko nārāyaṇaḥ'; ityupasaṃhṛtyādhītaṃ śrutyantaraṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:1482: 'na te'; iti vākyaṃ ca te devamahimnaḥ paramantaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1483: mahimānaṃ śrotrādinā nāpa iti prakṛtānuguṇyena sarvatrādhikaraṇe vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1489_0: evaṃ niravakāśaliṅgena viṣṇorantaryāmitvaṃ samarthya yaduktaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā prakṛtyāderantaryāmitvaṃ tatprakṛtijīvasādhāraṇaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1491: ata eva avyayamityāśayenāniyamābhiprāyeṇādau hetuvākyaṃ vyākhyāti - triguṇatvādīti
GSP33bbdip12u:1492: / sattvādirūpāstrayo guṇā yasya kāryabhūtāstattriguṇaṃ, tasya bhāvastriguṇatvaṃ tadādiryeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ, pradhānasya prakṛterdharmāḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1496: sādhyadharmapratiyoginirdeśāya pūrvapakṣe yuktisūcanāya ca prayuktaṃ smārtamityedvyācaṣṭe - smṛtyuktamiti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1502: antaryāmiṇo 'nyarūpatvaniṣedhāya pravṛtte sūtre 'pekṣitaṃ sādhyadharmiṇaṃ darśayati - antaryāmīti
GSP33bbdip12u:1504: na pradhānamantaryāmītyanena sautracaśabdaḥ antaryāmī viṣṇureva na tu pradhānamiti tuśabdārthaḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:1505: sa ca na śārīra ityādāviva parapakṣaniṣedhamātraṃ na kriyate, kintu, svapakṣavidhirapīti parapakṣaniṣedhasya svapakṣavidhipūrvakatvarūpaviśeṣārtha iti sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:1506: anenāntaryāmī viṣṇureva, na tu smārtaṃ pṛthivyādyātmakatayā smṛtau pratipāditaṃ pradhānam
GSP33bbdip12u:1516: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhannātmano 'ntaro yamātmāna veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānamantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1517: (bṛ.mādhyandinapāṭhaḥ) 'yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan vijñānādantaro yaṃ vijñānaṃ na
GSP33bbdip12u:1518: veda yasya vijñānaṃ śarīram'; (bṛ. 5-7-22.) ityubhaye 'pi hi śākhino bhedenainaṃ jīvamadhīyate
GSP33bbdip12u:1520: tatsādhakābhāvena nirastamapi punarbādhakākhyaviśeṣayuktyā nirākurvatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - śārīra iti // ityabhidhīyate ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1524: ātmano 'ntara iti mādhyandināḥ vijñānādantara iti kāṇvāḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1530: na kevalaṃ na smārtaṃ, kintu śārīraśceti samuccaye
GSP33bbdip12u:1532: tattvapradīpe tu - citprakṛterapyatra pūrvapakṣaviṣayatāmāśritya śrībhūdurgārūpāyāḥ tasyāḥ 'yastejasi tiṣṭhan';
GSP33bbdip12u:1533: (bṛ. 5-7-14.) 'yastamasi tiṣṭhan'; (bṛ. 5-7-13.) ityādyantaryāmiṇaḥ sakāśādbhedenādhyayanānna sāpyantaryāmīti samuccayārthaścaśabda ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1534: anena 'hi'; yasmāt 'ubhaye 'pi'; śākhinaḥ 'enaṃ'; jīvamantaryāmiṇaḥ sakāśādbhedena 'adhīyate'; āmananti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1536: śarīrābhimānī jīva iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:1543: yadyapi bṛhadbhāṣye ātmādiśabdasya caturmukhākhyajīvaparatayā vyākhyātatvādidaṃ sūtraṃ jīvaviśeṣasya yogino 'ntaryāmitvanirāsakamiti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1546_0: tathāpi yadā sarvajīvābhimānicaturmukhādapi tanniyāmakatvādinā bhinno 'ntaryāmī tadā kimu tadabhimanyamānasarvajīvāditi kaimutyadyotanāya
GSP33bbdip12u:1549: ramate ca parohyasmin śarīraṃ tasya tajjagat /
GSP33bbdip12u:1557: vartamānajagatsadṛśaṃ kālatrayābādhyaṃ vā 'jagat'; pṛthivyādi asmāt viṣṇoreva 'nityaṃ'; niyataṃ pratikalpaṃ 'śīryate'; naśyati /
